consumer = ChainConsumer()
consumer.add_chain(self.data)
consumer.add_chain(self.data)
consumer.add_chain(self.data)
consumer.configure()
alphas = [c.config['shade_alpha'] for c in consumer.chains]
assert len(alphas) == 3
assert alphas[0] == 1.0 / np.sqrt(3.0)
assert alphas[1] == 1.0 / np.sqrt(3.0)
assert alphas[2] == 1.0 / np.sqrt(3.0)
